# TranslateFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate IntPtr TranslateFunc(string path, IntPtr func_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| path | Transfer ownership: none |
| func_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full
